attributes.title: Deadly
attributes.review: This app gave my son coronavirus. although we cannot prove it, i have heard of several other cases of people getting covid19 after installing the app. i believe trump has hidden the virus in the app in order to infect people. 0/10 would not recommend to anybody who doesn’t want the coronavirus

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: It is unsafe and when I entered the app it asked for my email so I entered it but then only seconds later my phone got hacked and people kept on texting me pictures of dead people and really creeped me out if apple doesn’t delete this app then I will never buy any app products in my life or any games PLEASE DELETE THIS APP IT IS EXTREMELY UNSAFE. DONT DOWNLOAD IT

attributes.title: The orange is trash
attributes.review: This app is the most useless app ever after a week of waiting for it to down load it stole all my data and it keeps on glitching it is the worst app on App Store please remove this app before it cause other people trouble and I don’t like the orange that is on it devote trump he does not deserve to be president

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app took forever to download!! It took me 9 DAYS to download!! This is probably because president Trump most likely wanted to steal my information!!! Not only this but I kept getting threats from others on the app like okay what??? Like omg i🥵climed🧭out🥫of👋my🔒head🤯and⛸watched⏰myself👈implode💥a👅thought💭without ❌a⚠️body💤 oughta🎤be🐝the🏎 shot🥱

attributes.title: Awful.
attributes.review: This app took almost 2 days to download. CREEPY men try to contact me off of this app. And later after I downloaded it, I started getting notifications of a virus! After I deleted the app everything went back to normal. Highly do NOT recommend this app ☺️.

attributes.title: Very dangerous
attributes.review: Don’t use this app saying this from personal experience don’t use it cops showed up to my house and almost killed my dad but he is fine he just got out of the hospital and I’m glad other people are using their voice to speak up about this app

attributes.title: NOT VERY HAPPY
attributes.review: I didn’t like the app, it kept glitching. It would also keep kicking me out. I support the president but not this app, my phone has caught a virus, because of that I had trouble getting it cleaned out because most my service provider, was not able to help me because of the coronavirus.

attributes.title: No Just No 👎🏻
attributes.review: I tried downloading this app 340 days ago after the day i was born and it’s giving my phone glitches it literally hacked everything 😐🖐🏻. my fridge started playing four ❤️ in 👄 her 🧚‍♀️ by itself and it’s all this apps fault i will sue 😡😡😡 you tried 🧚‍♀️ never do it again 👄

attributes.title: Do not like this app
attributes.review: Since I have downloaded this it had been really slow and made my phone very glitchy. Won’t let me make an account and would not let me see the news going on inside this horrible app. That is why I give this app a one star review.

attributes.title: I highly suggest this app to be deleted 👎🏼😡
attributes.review: This app 53 hours do download and not only was the app not helpful whatsoever it also was the worst app I could have possibly downloaded it gave me a virus that I have a $268 receipt for. whoever made this app you should be ashamed of themselves and should be deleted from this earth.
